title: Publish Draft Version 29 to Production

requirements.text: Publish the currently deployed Draft Version 29 to the production environment, making it the active version served to end users.
acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 29 is promoted to production and becomes the default version users see.
A post-publish verification confirms the production app loads successfully and core routes render (Landing page, role selection, dashboards).

constraints: Do not modify any source code as part of the publish unless a blocking production issue is discovered during verification.
